noCoinContent.language: <color=#D19AFF> The balance of this bet is insufficient. Whether the warehouse commodity value <color=#FF0000>₱{0}</color> is sold and bet <color=#FF0000>₱{1}</color></color>

fail.language: Game failed, please re-open the game

loadingTips.language: Loading data, please try again later

rechargeContent.language: <color=#D19AFF>The balance of this bet is insufficient, and <color=#FF0000>₱{0}</color> is needed. Do you want to recharge the balance immediately</color>

exitConfirm.language: Are you sure to quit this game?

set5Down.language: You need to select 5 bet amounts

rulesC-11.language: 1. Number Game consists of 17 betting areas with numbers from 0-14

rulesC-12.language: 2. Predict where the pointer will stay and place a bet. If the prediction is successful, you can get the corresponding reward

rulesC-21.language: 1. Guess the color: choose one color, bet on all the numbers with this color, greatly improve the odds of winning

rulesC-22.language: 2. Guess the number: choose one or more numbers and bet on the number to get super high odds
